email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Given the current market, could you consider something in the high 40s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but the current market is quite tight. The best I can do is $49.75 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. $49.75 is acceptable, but could we lock in the laycan as October 15-18? Also, can we agree on a demurrage rate of $14,000 per day? Let me know if this is feasible. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can confirm the laycan as October 15-18. However, $14,000 per day for demurrage is a bit low. How about $14,500 per day? Let me know if this works, and I’ll prepare the charter party. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $14,500 per day for demurrage is acceptable. Please proceed with the charter party at $49.75 per metric ton and laycan October 15-18. Thanks for your flexibility. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great! I’ll prepare the charter party and send it over for your review by end of day. Thanks for the smooth negotiation. Looking forward to working together. Best regards, Sarah
